0.1.0.name: atom-city
0.1.0.description: A City Builder Game written in CoffeeScript for GitHub's Atom IDE!

readme:
Atom City - City Builder Game ============================= > Early Access / Technical Alpha Build **Atom City** is a minimalistic and reduced City Builder game built on top of GitHub's hackable text editor [Atom](https://atom.io) and written in [CoffeeScript](https://coffeescript.org) and [Less](https://lesscss.org/), using [Nunjucks](https://mozilla.github.io/nunjucks/). Please don't expect the best Game experience in your life, it's just a funny little project. Thanks, I hope you still have a little fun with it, even if it's **still a technical alpha**. Preview ------- [Click to Increase](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/SynderDEV/atom-city/master/animation.gif) [![Preview](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/SynderDEV/atom-city/master/animation.gif)](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/SynderDEV/atom-city/master/animation.gif) Features -------- - Waste important programming time by building a text-based City* - Can be easily hidden when the boss surprisingly walks into the room* - Colours and even more Colors, to look like a programming language from far away* - Almost no animation to not distract you from your job as a mayor* - Prevents you from pushing / deploying into production on Fridays* - Written in ATOM using ATOMs TextEditor (yes, that's a feature!) All features marked with an * on the end are not guaranteed. How to Play ----------- This game has been tested on Windows only. 1. Click on 'Atom City' under 'Packages' 2. Create a new City or Load an existing one 3. The rest should be self explanatory 4. Don't get caught Copyright & License ------------------- Published under MIT license
Copyright Â© 2020 - 2021 Synder & pytesNET
